page.title: 19ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content: WE HAVE ART AND CRAFT AS ONE OF OUR SUBJECTS IN SCHOOL.WE ALL LIKE PAINTING IT IS NICE TO HAVE A PICTURE DISPLAYED IN SCHOOL.SEVERAL CHILDREN MAKE MODELS AT HOME,THE BOYS LIKE MAKING MODEL AIRCRAFT.WE USE CRAYONS,AND PAINT,WE SOMETIMES MAKE PATTERNS.RECENTLY WE TRIED TO DRAW SOME PATTERNS IN THE STYLE OF OUR CHILDREN FROM FROM PAKISTAN.THEIR MOTHERS MAKE BEAUTIFUL CLOTHES,THE MOSQUE IS DECORATED WITH GEOMETRIC PATTERNS,THEY ARE NOT ALLOWED TO DECORATE WITH A HUMAN FACE.THERE ARE MEETINGS IN REDDITCH FOR PEOPLE INTERESTED IN POTTERY,PAINTING,DRESSMAKING,etc.
